widgets.onDraw:
// onDraw

ctx.fillStyle = cssVars.colorFill
ctx.strokeStyle = cssVars.colorStroke
ctx.globalAlpha = cssVars.alphaFillOn

var sliderWidth = width / value.length - 1
for (var i in value){
    ctx.beginPath()
    ctx.rect(i * width / value.length, height, sliderWidth, - value[i] * height)
    ctx.fill()
}

// How I do this update the canvas from stepPos variable?
var stepPos = get('seqPos')
var stepColor = "rgba(255,255,255,0.35)"
    ctx.beginPath()
    ctx.rect(stepPos * width / value.length, height, sliderWidth, - height)
    ctx.fillStyle = stepColor
    ctx.fill()
